attributes.action: Make road using cyclists comply with the same laws as other road users
attributes.additional_details:
To make cyclists identifiable / accountable for their actions the same as any other road user.
With the volume of cyclists using the roads forever increasing this issue must now be addressed
attributes.background:
Introduction of a cycle test similar to a motorcycle C.B.T with a licence to prove qualification / competence on the road and to endorse penalties etc
Have a visible registration for identification purposes 
Have insurance policy cover

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require licences for cyclists and number plates for all bikes/e-bikes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561046

Require cyclists that use the road have insurance and visible registration: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585207
